a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Stockpiles include warheads assigned to military forces, but exclude retired warheads queued for dismantlement.
Note: The exact number of countries' warheads is secret, and the estimates based on publicly
available information, historical records, and occasional leaks. Warheads vary substantially in their
Data source: Federation of American Scientists (2022)
